TextView.android:text: Department is offering a specialized unique program in Digital Image Processing in PG which is industry oriented. The course was structured as per the need of industries like canon, HP, Epson etc which are pioneers in color printing. Also department is offering Ph D program in different thrust areas. Department is headed by Prof E Srinivasa Reddy who has rich experience of 20 years in teaching and 10 years in research in the area of Image Processing.
